# userScripts

**Instance Property**

The user scripts associated with the user content controller.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var userScripts: [WKUserScript] { get }
```

## Adding and Removing Custom Scripts

- **addUserScript(_:)**: Injects the specified script into the webpage’s content.
- **removeAllUserScripts()**: Removes all user scripts from the web view.

items.description: Injects the specified script into the webpage’s content.
